hooks.name: Project Overview
hooks.description: Loads project overview including tickets status at session start
hooks.command: echo '## Project Overview' && echo && echo '### Tickets Status' && echo && echo '#### In Progress' && (find .memento/tickets/in-progress -name '*.md' 2>/dev/null | while read f; do echo "- $(basename "$f" .md)"; done || echo 'No tickets in progress') && echo && echo '#### Next' && echo "$(find .memento/tickets/next -name '*.md' 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' ') tickets" && echo && echo '#### Done' && echo "$(find .memento/tickets/done -name '*.md' 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' ') tickets"
